Home.MainText: We help you on your business production
Home.description1: The best combination of amino acids for stress management and optimization of various functions in the plant.
Home.description2: Liquid Organic Matter that reactivates the life of the soil, optimizing the use of resources and maximizing the productive potential.
Home.description3: Insecticide, adjuvant and organic biostimulant of great performance and friendly to the environment.

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.subtitle: The power of nature
AboutUs.paragraph1: We are a Chilean agricultural company, dedicated to the manufacture and commercialization of amino acids, organic matter and oil, for the nutrition and biostimulation of plants, reactivation of life in soils and crop protection. It is part of the holding company Fiordo Austral, the world's leading producer of proteins and oils made from SALMON.
AboutUs.paragraph2: The differentiating characteristics of Salmon as raw material are unique. Its marine origin gives it one of the highest biological quality proteins, so through different industrial processes, it is possible to obtain valuable combinations of amino acids and peptides, a rich liquid organic matter and omega 3, 6 and 9 essential oils with remarkable results in the field.
AboutUs.card1-title: Mauris fermentum at est in interdum
AboutUs.card2-title: Mauris fermentum at est in interdum
AboutUs.card3-title: Mauris fermentum at est in interdum
AboutUs.card4-title: Mauris fermentum at est in interdum
AboutUs.card1-content: In 1994, to solve the environmental problem generated by the waste from the salmon industry in Chile, it was born from the idea of producing a biostimulant from the enzymatic hydrolysis of the salmon protein.
AboutUs.card2-content: Thanks to the award of an Innova Chile (Corfo) project, the product is subjected to multiple efficacy tests under scientific methods, in collaboration with INIA, the results of which confirmed the preliminary observations.
AboutUs.card3-content: This is how AMINOTERRA® was born, a biostimulant fertilizer rich in free amino acids and short-chain peptides, considered as a unique Chilean product in the world for its provenance and benefits in different plant species.
AboutUs.card4-content: The development of new alternatives begins using the same raw material. Thus, it is possible to create and consolidate a business area dedicated to providing innovative and efficient solutions to the agricultural sector.

amendments.title: Organic Amendments
amendments.description1: It is a Liquid Organic amendment to activate soils, with a high content of organic matter of non-humic origin, fulvic acids, very high biological quality polypeptides, macronutrients (Nitrogen, Phosphorus, Potassium, Calcium, Magnesium) and micronuirienies (Zinc, Manganese, Iron ).
amendments.description2: Provides a substantial improvement in the physico-chemical properties of the soil.
amendments.description3: It stimulates the formation of an organic surface layer in the soil, due to the contribution of active organic matter.
amendments.description4: It favors the organic village and the micro organisms of the soil.
amendments.description5: Increases aeration, cation exchange capacity (CEC), and moisture retention in soils.
amendments.description6: Improves the growth of the root system of plants.
amendments.description7: Increases the nitrogen mineralization rate of the soil.
amendments.description8: Replaces fresh or composted güanos applications.

rootBiostimulant.title: Natural oil for agricultural use
rootBiostimulant.name: Aminoroot
rootBiostimulant.description1: Roots biostimulant based on free amino acids, plant extracts, fulvic acids and active organic matter, designed to promote and strengthen radical growth in all types of fruit, vegetables and crops.
rootBiostimulant.description2: Stimulates root growth by inducing an abundant and vigorous root system.
rootBiostimulant.description3: It improves the vitality of the plants causing a better uptake and absorption of nutrients and water.
rootBiostimulant.description4: It induces the formation of healthier, resistant and vigorous plants.
rootBiostimulant.description5: It causes a rapid growth to the establishment.

insecticide.title: Insecticide and Adjuvant
insecticide.name: SalmonOil
insecticide.description: It is a natural insecticide, formed from mixtures of different types of salmon oils, it works by contact. When applied to plants and insects, it generates a film that covers the airways of pests causing death by suffocation.
insecticide.description2: It can also be used as an adherent or adjuvant to improve the efficiency of other plant protection products such as fungicides, insecticides and herbicides.

Register.terms: He leído y acepto los términos y condiciones de uso.
